message.entry: Limit and Offset values for queries cannot be negative
The pattern value for the LIKE relation must be mf::zero::ValueFlags::SINGLE.
The pattern value for the LIKE relation must be a string type.
Relation ''{0}'' is not supported for type ''{1}''.
The value in the constraint is not a primitive type.
The types of the two properties in the constraint do not match.
Constraints on object properties do not support multi-value properties.
Instance id passed to AddConstraint is not in query.
Query does not have any search classes.
Query is not associated with any model.
could not find query result object in MF0 model.
'equal' and 'notEqual' are the only supported value match relations for Enumerated type query constraints.
'equal' and 'notEqual' are the only supported value match relations for object type query constraints.
Cannot create data source query without a data source.
Sorting by creation is not supported without a data source.
DMR data source query does not yet support self-join
Different instances are bound to the same instance id
